text: I'm successfully getting blog posts from my local machine, when I deploy to my aws server, I'm returning `{"correlationId":"7e2e6a1f-5481-4111-ad72-5440d99e2135","message":"Unable to process JSON","requestId":"f9a7e968-9119-492e-9c95-cf7e82095bf6","status":"error"}`
